entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - 24C14
entry.content:
Nov 21, 04:38 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 21/11/2022 03:30 UTC
End Time : 21/11/2022 03:40 UTC
Services impacted : The public network was unavailable.
Root cause : The incident was due to incorrect handling during the following change: https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/yc6q0k4h9p7w.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
